review: Everything I'd want from my banking app - easy to access but still secure, with all the functionality I need for making payments (including on that almost embarrassing day I forgot my wallet for dinner in a restaurant). Clear and user friendly. Keep it stable and safe and I'm happy!
title: Excellent, stable and user friendly

review: Good all round app and very easy to use to check balance and transfer money or make payments, would prefer to be able to access standing orders and direct debits to make changes if needed or at least be able to flip to desktop site instead if having to start up computer, but would still recommend üòä
title: Banking App

review:
Everytime I look for an app I want it's never been developed. I always search again two weeks later, and for some reason it's always been published within those few weeks!
I'm pretty pleased that BOS finally created an app, but I agree that the log in system is still too fiddly for an app. I second the PIN idea, it would be much easier, and still very secure.
title: It's a start!

review:
I can't believe it has taken this amount of time for the bank of Scotland to get an online banking app for the iPhone. Every other high street bank has had one available for over a year now. It's taken this amount of time for a very shabby app. Disappointed.

This app doesn't make it any easier than logging onto online banking over safari. It's has a very basic interface and logs you out if you navigate to the tabs at the bottom of the screen.
title: About time-Very basic

review: Have to applaud Bank of Scotland for making this great app. It's easy to sign up for and you can manage your finances on the go. It's much easier than the website - especially as you can now you the iOS built in touch system for identity verification. Definitely download.
title: Great easy to use banking app

review: Very reliable for payments and money comes off right away, easy to set up and pay contacts. Still occasionally freezes and doesn't work which is a bit of a down fall but works about 8/10 times.
title: Easy to Use and works most the time

review:
I really love this mobile banking app...it works so well, it's easy to use, everything is there at the touch of a button, it's up to date showing me every transaction, and it's quick!
My fianc√© is with another bank and their app is miles behind. 
Thank you x
title: Efficient and easy to use x

review:
As the title says it does what it's suppose to do. It's not glamours but it doesn't need to be ethier. 
I would love to recommend that they follow suit with PayPal and add in the Touch ID feature for logging in to make everything easier and loving the fact that they have added Apple Pay use now ..... Eventually
title: It does what it's suppose to

review: Excellent banking app and extremely easy to use... Makes it so much easier paying money into a business/personal bank account without the rigmarole of visiting the branch and standing in a queue to do something that takes only a few seconds on the BOS Online Banking App üòú
title: Easiest Banking App Available

review: I had decided I was changing banks to one with a cash back offer. However, this app has become so good it's worth the ¬£100 incentive not to change. Well done BoS, excellent app that does everything it should and far easier to use than on the website. Give yourself a pat on the back!
title: Perfect

review: I think this is a great app. Really makes day 2 day banking a breeze. I would love to have alerts for money in and money out which are above what your average sum is in case of fraud you could preset that amount in the app possibly. I would like to be able to have alerts if money is removed from outside the Uk.
title: Jinntyb

review: There is so much more that could be done, make it more personal, tell me how much i've spent under 5pound in the last 24 hours, let me see my spending and my patterns and what i should do to change it if i want to save up more. Yeah it's easy to use but don't stop there. Just because you're a boring bank doesn't mean your app has to be boring. Technology is always improving guys, better keep up with it or you'll lose.
title: So much room for improvement, get on it guys!

review: The BoS app is excellent. Secure login, extremely easy to use, account information is always up to date, and the facilities available are identical to those available on line. Making payments is so fast and easy it takes the stress out of worrying about missed bills. I'd recommend to any BoS customer!
title: BoS Ap

review: No more standing in line at the bank just to transfer money from one account to another. Really easy to use and saves a lot of time (like your lunch-break!!) having to go to the bank only for the people in front of you to take ages!!!!! Couldn't do without this.üëçüèª
title: Magic App

review:
The app is very clear on displaying your account(s),  very easy in transferring money for payments along with giving you options on Paying Now & Paying Later.
Would definitely recommend this to any fellow customer, especially for those who rarely have time to make such transactions & need to check their balance.
title: Very Handy

review: This app is so useful to check your balances, transactions and income even when out and about. You can make transfers in a few simple steps and the money is there immediately, quite amazing really. I'm very new to online banking but because of this I am now a fan.
title: Bank of Scotland banking app

review: This is a really good app, and I don't have to repeat all the positive feedback others have given already. Unfortunately, I regularly encounter the "black screen issue" mentioned by some reviewers, too. It means I have to restart my phone on a regular basis in order to launch the app successfully. Once I have done that once, a new log-in attempt will result in the black screen. Please get this sorted!
title: Fantastic - when it works...

review: The app is really good great for keeping up to dye with balances on the go and transferring money. The only thing missing is the ability to view pending credit/debit card payments to do this I have to use my browser and change to desktop view, if this was available in the app it would get 5 stars
title: Good but could be better

review: This app is very straightforward to use. It has never caused me any problems. I use it at home and out and about on my iPhone and iPad. It has improved since the last upgrade and I rarely have to log in to the Internet site now as I can do most of what I need on the app.
title: Simple and convenient

review: I find this app invaluable in checking up on accounts and transferring money either to pay bills, people or between accounts. Much quicker and easier than the website and works well on the go. I never have to go into the bank in person as this app is so quick and convenient.
title: Does what I need it to!!

review:
Nice and Easy to use; the only GRIPE I have is not with the App.,but with the Bank; it takes too long to update transactions, especially at the week-ends. 
One improvement to the app would be,with the touch of a button, the ability to see what DDs or S/Os are still to be paid!
title: Almost There

review: Had this app now for a couple of months and have no complaints.  Really easy to use, can quickly transfer money between my accounts and I use it daily.  Rarely have to go near the Bank.  Definitely would recommend it.
title: Love it

review:
I use this app daily, and from places all over the world and, providing there is an adequate WiFi / 3G / 4G signal, it had never failed.

I love the easy sign in, and as long as your memorable words / numbers are only memorised by you it performs well and quickly.
title: Does everything I need it to do

review: I love how hassle free it is to log in. How quick and easy it is transfer money between accounts and to make/set up payments. For my needs it is absolutely perfect, and why a BoS customer wouldn't have it on their smart phone is beyond me. Well worth the 5 stars I have rated it into opinion.
title: A Must Have

review:
I really like this app and it's new layout. Simple and easy to use. Makes banking much more convenient and quick for payments etc.  

I've noticed a few glitches with statement history so hoping when I log back in it's been fixed. Otherwise great.
title: Simple and Easy

review: This has worked fine until today it decides to stop working reinstalled and still the same not that it was amazing anyway just basically a link to the website as it is exactly the same set up
title: Annoying

review:
This app is so simple to use and has all account information I could possibly need on a day to day basis. 
Sign in takes seconds, I can do all basic transactions and it looks great.
I haven't needed to call or visit a branch in months because of this app, it really is fantastic.
title: Only way I Bank

review: I've been using this for a while now and find it highly valuable and easy to use. It's let me keep an eye on spending, account balances and carry out transfers whilst on the move. It's made life so much easier and manageable with one less thing to fuss about. This is what mobile banking should be about. Well done
title: Great for banking on the move

review: Have used for about 2 months.  Good app, easy to use but have to keep deleting and downloading again  as get blank screen when open app with Bank of Scotland at top but no way of logging in.  Would be great if could be fixed as have to re-register each time it's downloaded.
title: One Annoying Feature

review:
I think this app is great. Easy to sign in, easy to navigate. Makes life a lot easier to see direct debits or what money has been taken out and handy to pay an account. 
Only thing is I would like to be able to see pending transactions which is viewable on the website
title: Great App

review: Have used the app for 3-4 months now and find it easy to do what I used to go online for! I can't complain and would say to people to give it a go... after all you can delete it and go back online if it doesn't do what you want it to.
title: Good improvements

review: This app is now completely redundant for me. When it did work it wasn't very good but now it won't even allow me to sign in and all other functions just freeze. I have bookmarked the Internet banking homepage and just use that via the Internet browser which works fine but still isn't very intuitive as a mobile banking device. HBOS, please just invest some resources in making a decent stand along app, it isn't hard to make one!!
title: Use mobile banking instead

review: This app has been upgraded this year and what a difference - before it was good to look at but there were minimal facilities available. Now it is good to look at, easy to use and it is on par with Internet banking in terms of facilities. The transactions you can carry out are endless! Brilliant app!
title: Brilliant

review: Most updates are good but overall use is excellent. One bug the now is it shutting down when trying login (says maintenance message) but if you swipe the app away completely from the background (open apps) then reopen the login issue is gone.
title: Good useful app

review:
I was using the older version quite happily, but ever since I downloaded v1.1 the application bombs out whenever I select it without ever getting to the Main Screen. Please fix ASAP.

I've have to give it 1 star to submit a rating, but that's 1 more than it deserves.

I have an iPhone4, running v4.3.5
title: Application bombs on selection.

review:
This App works well for me - but still needs 2 modifications-:
1) Instant update of funds and transactions. You can see what balance you have left - but it can take 3 full days sometimes for each transaction to be available to view.
2) I would also like to be able to view any outstanding direct debits/ standing orders which are still awaiting payment.
title: Good, but could do better!

review: I have never used online banking before and I am very pleased with this app. I find it quick, simple and useful. I agree that sometimes transactions are slower to appear than I'd like but this is a minor issue. What I'd really like is to be able to name accounts, as in have a 'Christmas' account and a 'car' account or whatever, for saving.
title: Dr

review:
I think this update is great it has made things much easier to access 
As for other people being able to access your account the only way that would even be possible is if they know your password or you don't log out. 
As a victim of fraud on several occasions I'm still happy to use it
title: Great

review: I check my bank everyday pretty much and this is so much easier than logging on using a webpage. Plus it only asks for security details, not password and user name, which speeds things up. It verifies your phone instead.
title: Much easier than using a webpage!

review: This update seems really slow! Please fix it. Other than that, I love the ease with which I can move my money around my accounts using this app. Very user friendly, all the functions are super intuitive.
title: Version is slow but functional

review: At last Bank of Scotland are improving their online services having once been the leader in the market in the early 1990s. I never need to log into online banking now. This app does everything I need of online banking and let's me do it when I'm out and about. Brilliant!
title: Great Little App

review: This app has taken its hits and faults over the months, but now it's faster and easy to operate once you've fully set it up. Far less glitches and much more convenient to use. I can't remember the last time I was in a bank!
title: Has vastly improved from before

review: Despite other comments I really rather prefer the enhanced security settings similar to the website. I can do everything on the app that I can do on the web and all on the move (even from far flung places). Do think an ipad app would be great too though.
title: Works great

review: It works. Allows all of the actions you would expect of a banking app. Well thought out and easy to use. Other banks could learn a thing or two from this design, simplicity and features. Well done to the designers and developers.
title: Does what should, from a Banking App.

review: This is one of the best apps that I have and use it almost daily. It's so easy to manage my accounts, make payments and transfers and just keep tabs on my finances in general. I absolutely love it. Can't even think how it could be improved. It does everything I need it to!
title: Love this app!

review: Generally a great app, which I use all the time. It's great when on the go. The main problem I have is when setting up a new pay recipient- you are only allowed a very limited number of characters for their name! Many times I can't complete the persons surname! Very frustrating. Fix this and it would be perfect
title: One big annoyance....

review: As of right now I'm totally unable to see my accounts. I'm logged in fine and have had an online account for years. I'm 5 starring because its a start and hopefully improvements will be made.
title: Has to improve.

review: So handy and easy to use. I used to do telephone banking but this app allows me to transfer money, pay bills, check balance etc at the touch of a button whilst out and about. It's one of those things that I now use so often that I'm not sure how I coped before I got it!
title: BoS

review: This is a great app which gives full access to my accounts, comprehensive statements and total control of my money in a clear, user-friendly way. I use it practically every day and would recommend it whole-heartedly.
title: Easy to use, full access app

review: This app is easy to use, you can do most of your basic banking on it saving trips to the bank or lengthy phone calls. It is a great way to check your balance or transfer money when on the go.
title: Makes banking easy and simple

review: I use this app daily to keep track of finances, transfer money and the pay a contact is a great feature - no more writing down long bank account numbers. One of these apps that you wonder how you managed without it.
title: Excellent, easy to use app

review: This app works really well which surprised me! I can do so many things without having to switch on my laptop, phone or go into a branch. I would love it more if I could delete direct debits. It's made mobile banking really easy. Please don't change it!
title: An App that works!

review: Can't fault this app in any way I use it for all my accounts. The only issue I have is their is no way to delete pay contacts you no longer use meaning you have to search for the one your looking for on a sea of those you no longer use!!! Other than that the apps ability is great
title: Near perfect app

review: I got this app as it was taking forever to do anything on my phone on the website. It was quick and easy to set and it's very quick and easy to use. Would recommend to anyone who is with the bank of scotland, excellent.
title: Great, quick app

review:
This mobile banking app is brilliant! Easy to use, can allow you to transfer money, set up new payments etc with one swipe ;)
The only downside is, it doesn't show you the list of direct debits. I like to see which ones have come off already and which ones are yet to come off. 

Other than that it's fab!
title: Fab App

review:
Used to use this app allot there was some missing functionality but it never bothered me as a general user. For the last 6 months technical errors seem to stop me getting to the login on a regular basis, for me it's become unreliable. 
Had hoped this latest update would fix but just the same.
title: What happened!

review: Extremely satisfied and impressed with the ease and functionality of this App. However it's very very very slow in logging on, and slow to load anything ?, but that might be down to my internet !?. Overall it's a very worthwhile and very useful App to have, especially when paying bills !.
title: Excellent

review: Excellent app! Makes transfers, payments and general account checking so much easier and quicker. The only improvement I could suggest would be allowing the user to view pending transactions, as in the mobile internet version of the website. Other than that, this is a first class app!
title: Fantastic!!

review: App is a heck of a lot better now. It's really easy to use whilst still feeling secure.  But it's a little annoying to be still using the iPhone app zoomed for the iPad. Surely it can't be that difficult to change the screen resolution and release an iPad specific version.  Good, but could do better!
title: Great work, but still iPhone only.

review: Takes too long to log into your accounts. There's a long pause with the app loading when you first open it. Too many security questions that aren't app friendly when putting them in. Accessing your accounts takes time and transferring between accounts takes some time too. Should be more mobile friendly and faster at loading and transferring.
title: Below average

review: This app is very handy for paying off those coke bills and it's so easy to use. With every update they make it easier and easier to give away your hard earned money at the press of a button. Sterling work chapsüëçüèª
title: Easy to use and convenient

review: A great little app that provides enough functions to manage your money without sacrificing simplicity. Great that it uses the Touch ID and that it links other accounts from the group (e.g Halifax) in the one place. Been months since I used the website now üôÇ
title: Great Banking App

review:
Great App, offers so much flexibility when managing my account, while out and about.
Easy to navigate through all the functions. 
I'm very comfortable with the App security, it's now compatible with Touch ID which is a nice err, "Touch" üòâ
Now all  I need is money and we're in business! üòÇüòÇ
title: Peace of mind

review: Love this app - so handy being able to do banking on the move. So easy to use. Only thing I'd ask is that there's a link or some description for what some do the everyday offers are - some of the company's I've never heard of so don't know what the offer is for.
title: Life Saver

review: I find this app very easy to use, not sure I would change anything about it, Unless you can turn my mobile into a cash machine for the rare occasion I have to use actual cash,  I even pay my window cleaner through this app. Well done.
title: Really good

review: The app is not working properly just now. It is taking for me to put in my log in details 3 times before I can get access. 1st attempt kicks you out of app altogether. 2nd attempt logs me out and only on 3rd attempt does it let me in. Please sort it out!
title: App not working properly

review: Easy to use interface, just keep hold of your passwords and key information as you'll need them for adding contacts and transactions. Never had problems. Always super fast and convenient
title: What you should expect

review: Normally, I have no problems, & find this easy to use. Got a new phone a few weeks ago, & the app won't work at all- keeps saying I'm not connected to the Internet!! What's going on??! Have tried removing it, to re-install, but now I can't!! The app still works well on my old phone with wiFi connection!!
title: No Internet!

review: Terrible app that never lets you log into mobile banking!  Don't waste your time with this, you will only get annoyed when it pops up saying something went wrong we've had to log you out! Pretty stupid as I didn't even get to log in! Whos getting logged out like?? Lol . Find yourself constantly trying to log in , which never works . Really expected better from this . It's not like they can't afford it! Poor poor poor app!
title: Waste of time

review: I have used this app since its first issue. I travel abroad regularly on business and it has always been easy to use and has never given me any problems. Every update has made the app more versatile and user friendly. Perfect!
title: Bank of Scotland App.

review: Easy & quick to access accounts, all information available. Simple & easy to use views transactions, transfer, set up payments. Very pleased at how well they've made the app and easy for quick on the go banking.
title: Fantastic & simple

review: Overall a very good app however recently there appear to be some glitches with transfers. Moving money between my own accounts I have received the transfer complete notification, however when I next open the app it says transfer failed. This has lead me to unwittingly use my overdraft and be charged on several occasions.
title: Recent niggles!

review: Left the house without my wallet and bank card last night. Had to rely on other people to take care of me. Would be nice to use the Apple Pay function to tell the cash machine to give me ¬£30. Don't see why not with a NFC and fingerprint recognition.
title: Great app but...

review:
PIN logon, simple navigation between accounts and functions makes the App quicker and easier to use than the desktop.

The only negative is I often get a Logged Off message when first trying to login.
title: Really Convenient

review: For someone who is always on the go this a fantastic app to save you time. All you need is your memorable password and you can transfer money to different accounts and pay bills. Would recommend!
title: Quick, Easy & Efficient

review: I have RBS and HSBC business and BOS is the easiest to log into and do things. No stupid extra devices. I have my phone which they use to verify me if it is a higher risk transaction. Someone applied common sense to this app and it makes my life simpler. Would recommend this to anyone.
title: Best of all my banking apps

review:
This is an amazing upgrade to the app! I almost found the old version a little tiresome with logging in, this one is so much quicker. 
Once it's open everything us very easy to navigate to, payments and transfers are also so simple! Great app!
title: Quick and simple

review: A great banking up, unfortunately crashes often, logs you out randomly and sometimes doesn't let you log in. A shame because functionality and ease of use is 5 stars
title: Works really well when it works

review:
This app has been in construction for almost a year but feels like it was thrown together in a day. It is not a stand alone app but more a portal to the mobile web page and has serious reliability issues when it comes to logging in. There are more than a few bugs which will need to be fixed. Very disappointing indeed.

This just highlights another area in which the banks are failing their customers.
title: Very poor attempt

review: Brilliant app worthy of 5 stars maybe the only thing I would say is the option even when you leave the app and close it down! It still stays signed in for another 5 mins to save signing in again!
title: Does exactly as it says

review: This is a very well laid out app with all the information from all my accounts, it is very quick and easy to transfer money, pay bills etc. It's so much easier that other banking apps I have tried.
title: Excellent App! The best banking app I've used!!

review: Easy to use app for making payments, transferring money between accounts etc. Convenient on phone to do these tasks rather than having to get to a desktop/laptop computer. Business app is also good!
title: Review

review: I like this app and use it regularly but since iOS 8.0.2, I can no longer use it on my iPad. Really frustrating. The page won't load and iv had to delete it. Tried to load it again but it's not appearing on the app page!
title: Was better

review: I would give it another star, but like most apps it's not perfect, it has it's issues, but the bank is quick to sort these. Extremely handy app to have and with the new mobile payment system it's great.
title: Has it's issues

review: Only got a chance to use the new app once after a frustrating experience registering as it now tells me it cannot log in as I'm not connected to the internet although I'm on wifi üòí but first impressions were good
title: Few teething problems

review: Easy access to accounts for checking transactions as well as money transfer between BOS accounts and others make this app a must have for BOS customer Personal and or Business
title: Makes banking really easy

review:
Has the functionality I need, but why does it use old-style keyboards and fonts? It's a bit off-putting entering lowercase text on a keyboard that is labelled in uppercase and gives keypress confirmation in uppercase.

The app should use the current default system keyboard, not a hard-coded old one.
title: Decent Banking App but looks poor

review: This app allows me to check the balance of each of my accounts and transfer between them quickly. I can set up payments and standing orders to others hassle free. Very useful app which makes banking easy.
title: Very handy

review: This latest update is superb. Very user friendly and easy to use, looks great too. I use a couple of banking apps and this is the best by far. A considerable improvement on the last version, lots of banking functions are possible from the app.
title: Superb banking app

review: I absolutely love this app! It's definitely up there, very easy to use. The only problem I have is that when transferring money it lists account numbers rather than names, but that's an issue across internet banking. Really rate this app.
title: Nearly there!

review: Have been using this app for ages and it just gets better and easier to use with each update. The easy log in is great and the ease of accessing all your accounts is great. Never had one bit of trouble while using the app.
title: Excellent

review: To be able to open my account quickly & securely using fingerprint recognition on my iOS device is a great feature. Can do most of my banking from my phone which is a real plus from my side
title: Meets my needs

review: Need access to desktop site to view/amend direct debits so why isn't there an option for this??? When I try to access full site via internet it only throws up mobile version as it recognises my device. Extremely frustrating! Such an essential part of everyday life I will consider leaving BOS should a resolve to this & the many other issues not happen quickly.  This app makes managing my finances much more difficult. One unhappy BOS customer.
title: Seriously BOS sort it out!

review: It is convenient having it but it is more like a window that just takes u to the actual mobile website with a few extra features. Still it's better than nothing and hopefully updates will make logging in that little bit easier.
title: Meh

review: Viewing transactions should be more accessible. As it is a main go to point of the app. Instead other options are on the screen that are less used. Swap that around and it could be a five start!
title: Really Good

review: Why have boxes been replaced by hexagons ? It makes this unnecessarily fussy and no need - I prefer it plain - a good and hand app I have used from the beginning and saves me numerous phone calls - I esp like the deductions that are about to come off so that they are not forgotten about
title: Handy

review: Love this app but would like one improvement. I'd like to be able to adjust or alter payments. I have old payments listed that I'll never use and a couple id like to change as the person has changed their name.
title: Overall Good

review: Works well, never need to log on via website. Very quick to send cash to other accounts which is useful. Would love the app to be able to delete previous set up payees as I have too many that I never use now. Worried that I will send to wrong account one day! üò≤
title: Overall, great app.

review: Quick & convenient app that is so much more efficient than other banking apps. I have a First Direct account & the app is awful, I actually stopped using the account. Nationwide is the same. The BOS app does exactly what I need it to.
title: So much better than other banks

review: I rate this app highly and use it a lot while traveling which I also do a lot. Once it was set up I found it pretty easy to use and have never felt any concerns about security. The only reason it doesn't get five stars is that there's always room for improvement.
title: Does what it's supposed to

review: I have found this app to be brilliant, really quick and efficient, I was new to online banking and found this really easy to use. The app is understandable for people who are new to online banking and for the more advanced computer geek
title: Bank of Scotland app

review: I love how simple the app is to use, please never change this aspect of it. In todays world it is great to be able to check an move money around quickly. There are more wifi spots than branches and leaves branch staff to deal with more complex money matters.
title: Simple, effective, brilliant

review: This app is great everything is easy to use. The only thing that I would change is how long it takes to load up at first before you get the login screen. I've used the Clydesdale Bank app and you get the login screen instantly. Otherwise I wouldn't change anything.
title: Great

review: Why go in to a branch when you can do everything here from the comfort of your own home, quickly and simply. Very easy to use and self explanatory, DEFINATELY worth having and will save you so much time! Wouldn't bank any other way! :) x
title: Always saves a journey! :) x

review:
It's simple, easy to use and works. It may just be a portal to the Mobile Banking site but it makes it easier rather than going through bookmarks. 

It does payments, transfers and checks my balance. That's all I need it for and it works.
title: Simplicity

review: Thank god christmas has come early, I can't believe it after all these long awaiting years your finally here, ok where shall I start, well it's just perfect to be honest you can do everything that online has to offer and more, well done HBOS PLC.
title: Mr

review: So easy to sort everything out! I do wish there was a way to delete contacts though. The 'payment due' part on your credit card can be unreliable. Which is pretty annoying.
title: Great!

review: The revamped site has good usability, with the swiping between accounts very simple and clear. It is also now easier to log on to the app and transfer prepay funds than to visit the website on a computer.
title: Good app, good layout, reassuring security, good usability

review: As bank apps go, this is quite good, secure sign in, easy to use and allows you to do pretty much everything that the website does. It runs a bit slower than I'd like at times especially on certain tabs like the cashback deals. But overall it is fine.
title: Generally good app

review:
As I work offshore, this app allows me to manage my pennies while I'm away. 
A must app to have for modern day living, it gives you access to your accounts from the comfort of your front room without the need to fire up the laptop.
title: Life made easy

review: Seriously made my life so much easier especially when a transferring money between accounts, to recipients and to pay credit card. Simple, straightforward and so easy to use. Well done Bank of Scotland!
title: Brilliant app.

review: Each time I try to log in to mobile banking it says that I need to de register a mobile device as I have exceeded the maximum number capable. What?????? I only have ONE device. Has always worked until 24hrs ago. I've restored and recovered my phone twice and even set it up as a new phone just to eliminate a possible fault with my phone. Downloaded the app on another iPhone, logged in and it still says I've exceeded the maximum devices. Help please. Get the app sorted.
title: Unable to log in

review: The app is brilliant. Loads fast, runs quick and lets you easily see and manage your accounts. Not found anything missing. Rather use the app than the online site!
title: Does what you want and does it well!

review: This app does everything that one might really require from mobile banking.  I haven't yet come across anything that I want to do that is not available, and it is straightforward and clear to use.
title: Easy to use

review: Good app as it allows me to deal with all of my bank accounts and transfer money between them and friends. Only thing is the app does not allow me to see my pending transactions. It would be good if I could see my pending transactions to keep on top of things.
title: Good but no pending transactions

review: Been using this app for over a year and I find it really easy and convenient to use. I love the fact that I can transfer money between accounts easily. I would recommend it to anyone
title: I phone app

review: Love this app can do almost everything on app instead of having to go into bank... only problem i have is letting my son know that i can transfer money to his bank in seconds lol but in emergency its great
title: Bank at home

review: Easy to use app and has had extra functionality added which means most things can now be done on the app. Love fingerprint access as well.
title: Easy to use and lots of functionality

review: I've been using this app for a while now and have found it to be very user friendly. It's the easiest way for me to keep track of my account. Very easy to pay bills and transfer money.
title: Very easy to use

review: I found the app very slow and hard to use but every time they update it it gets better and better! Keep it coming and thanks for your hard work.
title: Great gets better all the time

review: Able to keep track of everything. It feels amazing to be able to check your accounts, and top up your credit cards regularly if you want to.
title: So handy

review:
Helps me keep on track with my accounts 24/7 as I am travelling all the time it's never been easier to check and transfer money between accounts and sending money to my kids 

Great app
title: Bank of Scotland app

review: This is a fabulous app. The recent addition of being able to set up new payees is really useful , especially when you're on the move. Completely hassle free. It might seem extreme, but I love this app!
title: At last an app that does what it's meant to!

review: The latest incarnation of the app now does everything from checking balances to bill payments. I now find the mobile version as versatile as the full desktop site. Keep up the good work!
title: Solid Banking App

review: I have been using this app for just over 3 months, and find it really handy. You can check on wages etc, & do transfers in seconds. Much easier and faster than putting on a laptop and waiting on it booting up.
title: Excellent app

review: Was a great app , now it won't let you log in , due to technical issues . Have tried reinstalling and ran into another problem, the automatic phone authorisation didn't work . Well done - 1 star for messing it all up !!!!!
title: You've ruined a good app !

review: Really like this app, so much easier  than having to go online to check my bank. Dead easy to log in rather than the big long number then password. The only thing I don't like about it is it doesn't appear to tell you what transactions you have pending.
title: Love it

review: What an improvement, well done!  Best mobile banking out there by far thanks to this upgrade.  I am now banking on my mobile instead of using the main site on my iPad.  Looking forward to the next set of improvements.
title: Super speedy!

review: New update ruined the app, defeats the purpose of convenient and easy to use. A known IT issue with app suggested deleting and reinstalling - which I did. I then had to call the call center on recommended number which took me an IVR and then it directed my call to the wrong area. The call handler then told me I had to complete a form online. And so the saga continued. As other users have pointed out it's far easier to use web browser and it has more functionality. App uninstalled.
title: Horrendous

review: After a few earlier glitches this is now the best app I have used for personal banking. Transactions, account management, transfers are all so easy and being able to see all accounts in one place is great
title: Best app for banking

review:
So it doesn't work using a mobile signal, only when you're on wifi. so it's not really a 'mobile' banking app, more of a 'use at home when you can't be bothered to use your main computer' app. It is not slick at all, constantly stuttering and lagging behind, which just makes it even more frustrating. 

Eventually just deleted it. Never got any further into it than the home screen....

(I'm running an iPhone 4s on the latest update)
title: Pretty pants...

review: I have both Halifax and Bank of Scotland accounts and several other accounts , this app is great and it works well with other banks to transfer, I work away from home and it means I have fantastic control of my money
title: Great

review: This app is intuitive and very easy to use, a great improvement over previous versions. It only missed out  5 stars as its not yet possible to access all bank services and account types through it.
title: Great App

review: I've used this app for years and never had as many problems as I'm having right now. The past few weeks when I try to log on it keeps coming up 'we are having some technical issues please try again later'! It's the most frustrating app I have on my phone and the one I probably try to use the most! Hope they sort out the bugs in the next update as this is horrendous! Xx
title: Extremely frustrating

review: So easy to use I especially like the new feature where it tells you what is pending to come off and who it's for! The only thing I'd like to see is a faster log in process I know a competitor lets you do it by your finger print....
title: Great app

review: This is one of the best online banking apps. Had a clear and easy to understand interface. Also good security, doesn't stay logged in if you leave the window etc.
title: Easy and professional

review: This app has improved vastly since it updated it's software. I use it on a daily basis now opposed to the desktop version. It is easy to use too which helps.
title: Amazing app now that all the problems have been fixed

review: Easy sign in. The app has definitely improved since the new feature were added. Although, I find it weird that if I make a payment during the weekend it says the date for the Monday, instead of adding it to the statement until Monday.
title: Good improvements

review: I am having the same problem as lots of other folk, I tap the icon, it looks like it's going to load and then shuts down. I have deleted and reinstalled several times but it has made no difference.
title: Terrible app

review: This is a great app and I use it almost every day. It's so easy to use, well laid out and I can do just about every banking thing I need to without even leaving the house. The finger print login in is great too. Recommended.
title: Very easy to use

review:
Makes monitoring my wife expenditures far easier, however spoiled my birthday as I can now see where she spent the money.
Just disappointed that after 4 months I haven't seen the Ann Summers products,other men would be curious I'm sure....
title: Great App

review: I love this app, it's so quick and easy to use. Can set up & amend standing orders and direct debits, transfer money all from my phone! All the improvements have made it easier to use. Keep up the good work!
title: Bank Of Scotland Mobile App

review: Best bank app ever, less restrictive than the internet site far easier to use! Especially when trying to see you're direct debits can hardly find it on the internet site version!
title: Bank app

review: Great app, easy to use & quick at the same time. I have used other mobile banking apps (RBS) and the hassle of setting up a new recipient is such a pain - with this app it's super easy. Highly recommend to anyone thinking of getting it!
title: MsVixen

review: What can I say does exactly what I need it too. Can access my account on the go, can set up standing orders, can transfer money to contacts or to my isa/savings account whenever I like. Brilliant app quick and easy to use.
title: Very useful app

review:
This app is fine. It does he job and hasn't caused me any hassle. Works well enough for every day banking transactions.

The RBS app allows you to enter it with your fingerprint which a) I think is more secure and b) saves time instead of entering a password. I'd like the BoS app to do the same.
title: OK but other bank apps are better

review: It keeps crashing, sometimes takes me 3/4 attempts to log in successfully without the app crashing. Seems to be since the last iOS update. However, I couldn't live without this app!!!
title: Great little app, but....

review: This is one of the best banking apps I have used.  Easy to navigate, secure and access is almost 100%, I have used a bank app that had more downtime than uptime. Never had a problem with this one.
title: Works for me every time.

review: I use the BOS banking app all the time. I can manage all the transfers and regular payments from my phone in minutes, much quicker than phone banking and easier to fit into a busy life. And now touch login! Happy days.
title: Great on the go

review: This app lets me do everything i ever need to do from wherever i am when i remember to do it. Pay bills, transfer money and check balances. You can even apply for new accounts. All very easy to use.
title: Excellent app

review: Why change something that works well. Who designed this as it is certainly not an improvement on the previous one.
title: Bring back the old one

review:
You'd think that when it comes to a mobile banking app reliability would be the most important priority. However there are a constant stream of updates which make slight improvements to the look and design of the app but every second one seems to break it and make the app unusable. 
Once again, at the moment this app is completely broken.
title: Good when it works

review: Intuitive design, all the main features you need. Looking forward to future updates.
title: Quick and easy to use

review:
This is probably the worst app I have used. After seeing the advert on the TV I thought about time, however, it is merely the mobile version of the website. I notice the first 5 reviews are all 5 stars, maybe being cynical but I'm guessing some of these will be attributed to whoever made the app and probably their friends!!! 
Bank of Scotland, come on, get it sorted, really can't be that difficult, in fact, I'll even do it for you!!!!
title: Terrible....merely mobile website

review: I find this very handy I use to phone the phone banking all the time but now I can check my account transfer money and pay bill and report my card all in the one app love it
title: Banking app great

review: Find using the mobile app much easier than online or telephone banking to make payments, check balances etc. Simple and straightforward to use. Glad I downloaded it.
title: Works well

review: So slow, and that's when it actually lets me open the app. Most of the time it tells me there's a technical problem. Real disappointment and annoying. As it's an app I use many times as day.
title: Slow!

review: Is everyone else having a problem with ios 8.3? App keeps crashing upon startup and when retrying it logs out. Usually have to try 4-5 times before it works but is likely to crash at any moment
title: iOS 8.3

review:
It's ok on iPhone but doesn't allow me to authenticate on iPad. Just crashes.

Update - can't authenticate new iPhone. Can't receive the authentication phone call on either iPhone or even landline! So can't ever use the app on a device. Where's the issue? Bank says me! Used to really like the app but now unusable
title: Ok

review:
Find that since the updates it's even better. Simple to use and very intuitive.

Since the updates this has gone from good to even better. Keep up the good work
title: Great when on the go

review: Just started using this app and so far everything has worked very well. Much more convenient than using the website. Easy to navigate and has brought me into modern times using mPay!
title: Great little app

review: Sometimes my list of existing payees won't come up. Instead, a screen to create a new recipient appears. Very irritating and a step backwards from the previous process.
title: Transfer function is irritating

review: After reading the reviews I wasn't expecting much but this app has been amazing. It has never let me down, I check my balance, transfer money cancel direct debits at least 3 times a week and it works great :-)
title: Banking app

review: I've been using this app for a while now and it keeps getting better as they add more services to it. I've never had any problems with it and I find it easy to use.
title: Easy to use

review:
It works well most of the time, although I can't get logged in occasionally. 

Really easy to set up new payees now, prefer this to the iPad version where you still need to verify by phone.
title: Easy to use

review:
Very good app and does exactly what you need it to.
Instant access to huge array of actions and so convenient to see what's going on with your accounts at any given time.
Would highly recommend to anyone! üëç
title: Highly Recommend!!

review: Makes life much easier compared to the full site if you just want to make a quick payment/check your balance.
title: Very useful, quick and intuitive :)

review: Great app that allows you to do the basic banking you need. The interface is a bit dated, especially on larger screens like the iPhone 6 and the keyboard is bizarre. Why they don't use the ordinary iPhone keyboard I don't know. Integration with notification centre and TouchID support would get the rating to 5 stars for me.
title: Very good

review: Never had a problem with this app yet. Works perfect all the time for me and very useful, has a great user interface so is easily used and intuitive. Would highly recommend!
title: Works really well!

review: Really easy to use, safe and secure and allows you to pay either contacts with a few simple clicks or transfer money between your own accounts even faster
title: Great app

review: New app still don't work! I've deleted and downloaded new app continually - the strange thing is when I'm trying to set up the MI stage it continually brings down my broadband connection! Well done BOS......what a terrible digital development!!!!!!!!!!
title: Still doesn't work....ahhh!

review: With the old version of this app, I could check my balance with my jail broken device, since this update I can't, bring back the old version or fix it please!
title: Bring back old version

review: I love this app. I don't find any issues with connectivity when I'm not using wifi. I use this all the time when I'm doing my banking. Never go on the website or use the telephone anymore. Thanks BOS :-) a very happy user!
title: I use it all the time!!

review: So easy to use I use it almost daily ! Let's me keep on top of my finances much easier and simpler ,however yet again a system that is going to do away with people's jobs üò¢ and that makes me sad x
title: Fabulous

review: Excellent app, I use it on a daily basis to keep track of spending and to transfer money. It's probably the best thing about Bank of Scotland. The most user friendly banking app I have used. Please don't change it!
title: Best thing about BOS

review:

I love this app so much, it makes my life so easy with how quick and easy it is to use. Never had any problems with the app and

title: Best iOS Banking App!!!

review: Great app, use it daily for all my banking needs. Only way it could be improved would be if the iPhone's fingerprint scanner could be used to log in - so only 4*
title: Could be a little better

review: This is by far the best banking app available today. I can do everything I can do from the website and all whilst on the move. A very stable app with an intuitive UI. Highly recommended for all BOS customers.
title: Best banking app

review: Great app. Slick UI. I haven't experienced the slow logins others have mentioned. Great functionality although there is one addition I would like is a search statement function, like the one on the website.
title: Excellent

review: Really simple intuitive app. Works well while still retaining effective security using call backs, verification codes and text messages. Recommended.
title: Very easy to use - no need to call the bank ever again

review: One of the best apps I've used in terms of checking my balance, making payments to family, friends & small business in one click, never had a problem.
title: BOScotland App

review: All it really does is open the mobile site, which I can do from safari anyway. It adds the ability to find a cash machine but that's of limited use and lots of other apps can already do that. To be honest you might as well add a desktop shortcut to the web page instead of using the app.
title: Slightly pointless

review: I use this app a lot and was a bit surprised by the recent update. The UI is horrible. The new features are great and really add to what you can do, but the look of it is terrible. Really cluttered compared to the last version which was nice and clear. Also very buggy to use. Signed me out on many occasions when doing transactions. Needs improving quickly.
title: Not a good update

review:
This app keeps getting better. Is a real bonus with my banking and feel secure too. 
Would recommend over another app I have from another bank.
title: Makes life easy

review: Great app, I use this to access all my accounts and it never fails to deliver, however there are still some thing you need to access the online account on a PC to complete.
title: Banking

review:
Really useful, easy to use, clearly structured app. Its made my life so much easier. I only switched to BoS late last year, but now I recommend it to everyone. 
Easy to check accounts, move money, organise transfers etc.
title: Top marks

review:
Much easier to use than the last version. So far no problems quick to log in and can transfer money between
 Accounts with ease
title: So far so good

review: Fantastic app, very user friendly and even better with the latest update. Accessing your accounts is so much easier now, dont have to deal with big clumsy passwords anymore! Super happy customer! :)
title: Very impressed!

review: Having followed all the instructions been told I have registered successfully it then tells me login has failed and try another number. But you have phoned me and told me it works!! This app is as rubbish as BOS ever since it merged with the Halifax!!
title: Rubbish

review: Loaded the app and logged on first time without any problems. Worked fine for me I so can only think there were problems with people's accounts who left negative reviews
title: Bank of Scotland App

review: This is a great app, I especially like that I can use the iPhone's finger print recognition to log me in rather than type a big long password. Now I can see how poor I am in seconds rather than minute.
title: Great app

review: Functional, easy to understand and use. Would be nice if you could put a reference when you make a transfer as you can when making a payment.
title: Tidy wee app

review: I am not the most clued up on banking issues, and mostly rely on my Mrs to deal with the 'money' however this App has allowed me to keep a close eye on my funds and it's so easy to use. Very secure and gives me great piece of mind. Greatly recommended !!
title: Great, Easy & Secure!!

review: This app is great for checking your bank account on the go. Only issue I have is they seem to have a lot of technical issues and a lot of the time I can't get logged on. It really is becoming a pain now that every time I need to check my balance I get a screen saying "you've been logged out! Sorry we're experiencing technical difficulties right now please try again later" please get this sorted BOS!!!
title: Great app when it works...

review: Cannot think of an easier way to control, transfer and monitor funds. Makes life a lot easier. Would recommend this ap without hesitation.
title: Convenient banking

review:
Since the update, setting up new accounts to transfer is a lot faster and less hassle than before. 

Logging in so much quicker too!! Great update!
title: Simple and quick to use app

review: I normally find Internet and telephone banking fairly painful to use. But I've been really impressed with this app. It is intuitive, quick, and does everything I need for everyday banking. Good work BoS!
title: Effective and easy to use

review: A fantastic app from a fantastic bank. ( you can clear my overdraft if you want now) really easy to use and extremely quick as well! A lot better than the treacherous RBS.
title: An app that really does make life easy

review: I have used this app for some time and have never had any problems. Great app and ability to transfer on the go has saved me a couple of times!
title: Works perfectly well......

review: Recent update has made this app more difficult to use on the iphone. Whilst adding payments functionality, which was needed, the selection of password/pin is more difficult and you cannot now see the reference information on the payments screen. Time to move to another bank if things don't improve
title: Just got worse

review: This app is the best thing since sliced bread.  I can check the balance of my accounts daily and transfer funds. It also gives me the opportunity to earn cash back. Very easy to use.
title: Great

review: Transfer money between accounts, transfer money to friends account and pay contact(the latter needs to be set up) all the info all the time... Excellent
title: Does exactly what it says

review: The app to start with gave some banking functions but not all. Every time the app updates the services keep getting better and better.
title: Keeps getting better

review: Reliable, safe way to use mobile banking. simple to use to keep an eye on my accounts, pay bills and transfer money to friends and family.
title: Simple and safe

review: I've no problems with this app and use it often, it can get a little buggy from time to time but on the whole works fine
title: Can't do without it!!

review: Really glad BoS have created this app. I've been waiting on this to arrive. I think it's really good and logs in really quick on iPhone 4S. Hoping any updates will be good.
title: Really Quick

review:
No more convenient than the full site. Still have the whole logging in process. RBS app has shortened signing in process for their app and way more features. BOS really need to see how others are doing it. Having an app supposed to be more stream lined this is just too fiddly for something I want to check on the move. 
Takes ages to log in at times.
title: Not my fave banking app

review: This makes everything to do with banking as simple as possible. I feel a lot more organised now having everything in one place online
title: Fantastic app

review: This banking app works very well and is quick and easy to use, even for transferring money or paying bills. It's far better than the other bank app I have.
title: It works

review: Have recently switched from M&S bank due to their very poor online and phone banking apps so am delighted at how easy this is to use on the move and when with friends!!
title: Brilliant!!

review: Not pretty or fancy just does what you want. As with anything related to finance its always worth taking time to understand the various options and how the information is displayed
title: Does the job

review: Works well. I've complained about not being able to edit existing recipient's details when making international transfers and this is now possible. Best yet.
title: Really Fast and works smoothly for me

review: Since update the app is slower to load and encounters technical problems often meaning I can't log in.
title: Why do updates cause problems it never had.

review:
Fast, easy to log on and use.
Does everything I need to do online.
Check balance, track incoming and outgoing payments and make payments to other accounts.
title: Brilliant app.

review:
This banking app is great! It's easy to use and quick to log in, much better than Santander where you need to give your life story to log in üò¨. 
The only improvement I can think of is fingerprint log in then it would be a perfect 5*
title: Excellent app

review: Really wouldn't recommend to anyone using an iPhone or a blackberry, the app hasn't worked on either of mine ever. Would be so useful if it did work but unfortunately doesn't, waste of time.
title: Not good

review: This is a very efficient app, allowing me to do my banking on the go. Everything is at my fingertips, making life that little bit easier when managing my financial affairs.
title: Easy and convenient

review: Downloaded the app and everything works so easily and so simple to use. Does everything you need from an app. Great addition to my IPhone - supports in the goal of never taking a wallet out
title: Top banking app

review: The new version feels like a change for change's sake, particularly the design. I personally preferred the previous design, and think the effort would have been better spent adding new features like share dealing to the app.
title: Preferred previous design

review: Easy and clear to use but can fail to launch often and takes you to you have been logged out screen. Would also like not to have instant log out when you move off the banking screen. Have a time not instant log out!
title: Clear to use but...

review: Tried everything to get this app to work on my iPhone 4s, including an age on the phone. Fails the authentication on the last step...very disappointing!
title: Disappointed

review: Use this app every day without even a smidge of bother so far. Find the interface extremely easy to use, no problems with bugs or anything like that - all round useful app.
title: Great App

review:
Have had 2 main problems with this app. You cannot delete ppl set up previously via the app, needs to be on a PC / laptop. 
Secondly transfers usually show immediately but are not currently, meaning you are unsure if you have paid something or not. No warning information on the site about the technical issues to when I sent it again I was told to contact the person for a refund-shambles BOS!
title: Poor app

review:
Do all banking online so felt it might be useful on the move to have the app on the iPhone 6.
All I get is the tech apology - have never managed to log in.
BOS Help desk don't know anything about it - they clearly don't look at the App store reviews.
How is it that there are two distinct classes of user? Those that say it is great and those that are frustrated by the problems trying to login.
Get it fixed BOS
title: Difficult to see the amazing bit

review: I have been using this app for few years now and I think it is brilliant to keep up to date with my balance, make payments, do transfers, life would not be the same without this app.
title: Ohhhhh Aiiiii

review: Does everything I need it to do quickly and efficiently. Very easy to use and navigate. Only issue I have is it sometimes crashes or needs multiple login attempts due to poor internet/4G connection.
title: Very happy with it

review: Very good app with easy menus and intuitive buttons. Some functionality not available on app that can be done on website eg inbox msgs, but nothing that can't wait. Excellent!
title: Excellent simple and easy to use

review: Seems to work well. I particularly like the planned travel option although this is well hidden. It would be nice to use the touch sensor but entering 3 digits is hardly difficult.
title: Works fine on IPhone 6

review: Really useful app for on the go banking. Prevents me having to go to cash lines to check my balance. I can also make transfer payments to my savings account instantly! Brilliant app used every day x
title: So handy!

review: I really like this app, it is so easy to use.  I can keep track of all of my accounts with one quick log in.   It is perfect for making quick payments and transfers.
title: Great, very convenient!

review: Great app, so easy to use and fast. The only issue I've had is with international payments which should really be done with a computer anyway as they get quite complicated.
title: No Complaints

review: Allows me to do most of my banking on the move. Not had any issues. Would be good if credit card was linked in as well but have same issue with Internet version so something for the future maybe.
title: Great App

review: I have not had one problem with this app, has every little piece of information you need, works fast and fluent in everyway, it's a fantastic help no matter where and when you need it.
title: App is great

review: Best version yet but as mentioned in some other reviews it does seem to 'stick' at times when trying to move between accounts. Great for transferring and making payments and I now use it in preference to my laptop
title: Improved

review: Can't find any issues with this App at all. Does everything I need it to do and more!! Can only think the people complaining have a 'phone specific' problem.
title: Good shout from BOS at last!

review: This is a great way to access BoS accounts - once set up, it's straightforward and intuitive to use. After years of clunky websites and tedious login procedures, they've finally joined the digital age - well done, Bank of Scotland!
title: Great app

review: It's the first such banking app I have used and now find it the most convenient way to check my bank account and make payments. It's stable, reliable and seemingly secure.
title: Simple to use

review: I found it very handy application I'm able to view, transfer, make pay and a lot more from my account when ever I want without any difficulty.
title: It is handy apps.

review: Used this app for about 4 years, it does everything I want from a banking app, very seldom ever been down maybes twice in the time I have used the app but I have been prewarned this would happen
title: Baxter

review: Easy to use, easy to follow and easy to get into unlike some banking apps which require multiple steps. Will continue to use frequently
title: Does what it should do

review: Since the updates its became so much easier to use! Love that you can see pending transactions & update your everyday offers! Quick, simple & easy!
title: User friendly simple great app

review: Have had no problems able to pass money around without entering a bank
title: No problems

review: The app is as the title says shows all accounts transactions and allows payments and transfers on the go. Overall a great way to access bank accounts when you are not near a branch or computer
title: Simple easy to use

review: If you don't like standing about in you local bank waiting to pay your credit card you have to get this ,fast and easy.
title: Time saver.

review: This is probably the simplest and customer friendliest banking app I use. Love the fact you don't need card readers and a million passwords and personal questions. Don't change a thing. Brilliant.
title: Love this app. So easy to use

review: This app is an example of what banking apps should be. Quick, simple, sure the colour scheme doesn't inspire but you don't want that, with apps like this it's all about the ease of use and function.
title: So fast, so simple

review:
Good easy sign in setup which is great, but it lacks quality after that 
It's got better recently but bugs seem to have stopped moving between accounts from working so i can't get to accounts that matter 
Being able to choose the account you get shown first would be good as I have old unused accounts that always appear first when I log in
title: Good sign in but little else going for it

review: Really pleased with the update. Makes signing in take a fraction of the time and it is really handy for checking balances and transferring between accounts (the only use I have for it)
title: Fantastic

review: Gr8 for when you're in a rush and does everything you need without accessing the normal online. Quick and easy to use and much more info now in it
title: Bos mobile app

review: What a difference this new app has made! It is so easy to use and with no problems(well I haven't found any yet!). It is so easy to transfer money and to check balances. Thank you!!
title: Well done BoS

review: This is a great improvement in the old app, far more responsive, much better looking and so easy to login now, still room for improvement but 5* for complete redesign!

review: Disappointed as now you can't directly log into desktop site  which was a great feature of old app to control direct debits and other aspects of your account.

review: All other apps work fine including Amex, first direct etc and I am connected to wifi. It says authenticating my device then tells me I'm not connected to the net and says I've been logged off. No options to do anything but click log in, where the same thing happens over and over. App worked fine before the update. Tried reinstalling, didn't work.
title: Logs me off straight away. Not connected to Internet.

review: I don't know why there are so many poor reviews of late, I have just downloaded the app and it works fine, better than some other banking apps I use...

review: No words, just a great app, don't hesitate to download it, its very secure, I do all my banking with it, it even shows all 'related' accounts that you have at a glance so no need to log into multiple accounts.
title: Brilliant

review: Worst app. Constantly viewing a 'sorry we are experiencing technical difficulties' message and can rarely even get past the log in page. Sort it out please!
title: Useless

review: Use the BoS app for personal and Business banking and it is extremely reliable and faultless in all desired functions and transactions. Would highly recommend this app!
title: Just Brilliant

review: As a pensioner I love this App. Makes life a lot easier, is simple to navigate and most importantly, secure. Those complaining, clearly don't remember having to actually go to a bank to do business. Well done BoS.

review: Great app when it works, but when you are in a hurry and it keeps logging you out it can be very frustrating. Still it's simple to use and you can manage all your banking at your fingertips

review: Great app, quick and helps you keep up to date with your finances easily whilst your on the move. Improving it all the time means it's up to date with in line with Internet banking.

review: I really like this app from the BoS/Halifax. I use it daily to check my balance and to move money around. So easy to use once you have set up the security. Would recommend to anyone.

review: This App has given me an efficient tool for quickly accessing my finances, and such a well thought out simple design, no flashy gimmicks, does the job.  A definite thumbs up for Bank of Scotland.  Yes you can!

review: Use this app daily so quick and easy to use. When the device is registered (I use iPad) only 3 taps and you are in no need for phone verification  when setting up new payments great !

review: Years ago Bank of Scotland was a pioneer of remote computer banking. Having fallen behind over the years they have now at last produced a brilliant app that works perfectly. Impressive.

review: This app is handy but it needs an option to view a list of direct debits and the last time which they came off of the account.

review: Don't try and fool us, this is a glorified bookmark.  I also have accounts with RBS and while their app is basic it does allow me to check balances and make payments quickly.

review: I find that I've stopped using the web version in favour of the app. It works well, it's quick to login, fast and it's secure.

review: Great usability with all the features that I require included. Better than competitors apps I also regularly use. Would love to see Touch ID for quick login added in a future update!

They had just updated the last app to do this option for you, so back to the dark ages! Don't like the idea that now there is only one password for sign on, feels less secure than the other. Over all really upset I update by accident!
title: Worst app yet

review: Safari does the same thing.... But eventually we have an HBOS app!! At least it's a start. Look forward to an update where it doesn't look like a web browser :)
title: It's a start.

review:
It's ok, if you want to just check your balance etc transfer money, could do with a bit of updating and make it it's own instead of just a basic app that really just takes you to the website, RBS have a much more superior app to this for their customers. 

Apart from the above, functions well and allows me to do what I need personally.

review: Now BoS have always been backwards and behind the curve, and I only switched because the gave me ¬£100 and a credit card. What's astonishing is this isn't the BoS app, it's the same generic app used for the entire Lloyds Banking Group, how in this age, LTSB and HBOS between them can come up with nothing more than a glorified bookmark that takes you to a clunky, fussy web page is absolutely astonishing!!

review:
Ok will break this down for everyone. 

Login: simple quick and secure. What else do you want. 

Look and feel: slick and easy to navigate. 

Features: I only use it to check balance. Transfer money and pay bills.  Put it this way I no longer use my computer to do my bos chores. 

This app had come along way in short period of time. However there is no need to change it. It's works. It's great. Keep it this way.  :-)
title: Top banking app

review: Poor. Poor. Poor. I have to restart my iPhone every time I need to use this Ap. I can use it once then if I try and go into the ap again all I get is a black screen.

The comma button does not work and this app is no good for anything except checking my account. Why change something that was working well?

Sadly, this is clearly not the case. Please sort this sort!

The app is not as bad as some people's reviews are, but does need a bit of looking into. 

For example, making an app for the iPad as well as the iPhone, and looking into making the log in process a little easier.

To me, it does what it says, an easy way to check on my accounts, but right now, as I don't have an iPhone just yet, I might as well be using the website, as the picture is not very clear on the iPad. 

I look forward to an upated version! Good first attempt!

review: Love the app as it makes moving money so much easier and let's you keep control of all my accounts in one place and beats waiting in queues
title: Fab

review: While the new features are a nice touch, using the app itself feels like a step back. It feels sluggish and a bit buggy, I don't think the new UI is any improvement over the previous version and almost feels less BOS as a result.
title: Step backwards

review: For a bank of Scotland customer you can't go wrong with this app. It does what it's supposed too, you pay bills, check and manage account. Straightforward and gets job done quickly.
title: Good App

review: Having said that it's a bit slow starting it is easy to use. Very satisfied with the app.
title: Bit of a slow starter

review: Very easy to use app, allows you to transfer money, pay credit cards in a matter of seconds
title: Great banking app

review: I've happily used this app since I downloaded it and have never had problems but now it constantly refuses to let me log in. Very frustrating when I want to move money or pay bills.
title: Started to go wrong all the time

review: I like how easy it is to check account balances, transfer money & confirm certain transactions have been processed.
title: Safe & easy to use

review: Easiest way yet to manage my accounts, quick to log in. I don't use desktop page anymore.... No need this app does it all
title: great app

review: Superb app great and easy way to keep in control off your finances, easy to set up, love pay a contact it's so simple to use. Totally recommend having this app
title: Review

review: Really quick and easy to use and I can make payments from anywhere.
title: Easy and quick
